problem_text:
8.5. Prove that if X is a finite group, F is any field, and M is a non-trivial irreducible FX-module then
(1/|X|) \sum_{x\in X} dim fix(x) \le (1/2) dim M.
M. R. Vaughan-Lee
answer: Proved, even with ... ≤ (1/p) dim M, where p is the least prime divisor of |G| (R. M. Guralnick, A. Mar´oti, Adv. Math., 226, no. 1 (2011), 298–308).
